div.p: >>> PERSONAL STORY TELLINGMENT TONIGHT.

THE TWO MAIN GUYS OVER THERE.

NOW THAT THINGS ARE NOT GOING REAL WELL FOR THE
OBAMA ADMINISTRATION AND THE DEMOCRATIC PARTY.
THE QUESTION BECOMES WILL THESE GUYS CHANGE?

BUT IN DEBT. >> I STILL GET EMOTIONAL
JUST THINKING ABOUT IT. [ LAUGHTER ]
WELL PLAYED, MRS. CLINTON. BUT IF I KNOW JOE BIDEN YOU
JUST BROUGHT IS $100 TO A LOOSE CHANGE FIGHT.

HE MAKES NOTWITHSTANDING THE POOREST MAN IN CONGRESS.

THE REPUBLICAN PARTY

VERY HARD AGAINST PRESIDENT OBAMA.
THE HUMOR IS GENTLE.
THAT’S TAKEN THEM OUT OF

HOWIE. >> THANK YOU.
>> I DON’T THINK YOU ARE QUITE RIGHT THERE.
LOOK AT ALL THE SCANDALS THAT HAVE HAPPENED UNDER THE

SMOKE POT THEY STILL COUNT

I UNDERSTAND THAT THAT’S THEIR CORE.
AND THE CORE WANTS TO HEAR THAT O’REILLY AND OTHER
